title: 93/128/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 February 1993 concerning certain protection measures, with regard to swine vesicular disease, in the Netherlands and Italy
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 February 1993 concerning certain protection measures, with regard to swine vesicular disease, in the Netherlands and Italy
(93/128/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The Netherlands shall not send live pigs from its territory to other Member States;
2. Italy shall not send live pigs from its territory to other Member States.
Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision shall apply until 1 April 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 February 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29.
(2) OJ No L 268, 14. 9. 1992, p. 54.
